mapper.select: SELECT e.*, c.det_sort as pos_sort FROM employee e LEFT JOIN code_detail c ON e.emp_pos_cd = c.det_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{loginEmpId}

SELECT e.emp_id, e.emp_pos_cd, cd.det_sort AS pos_sort FROM employee e JOIN code_detail cd ON e.emp_pos_cd = cd.det_id WHERE cd.det_sort < #{docEmployeePosSort} AND NVL(e.emp_cat_cd, 'x') = NVL(#{catCd}, 'x') AND NVL(e.emp_dep_cd, 'x') = NVL(#{depCd}, 'x') AND NVL(e.emp_team_cd, 'x') = NVL(#{teamCd}, 'x') ORDER BY cd.det_sort ASC
